suite.name: Heroku

test.name: Verify Basic Good Auth Page

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Handle Alert
kw.doc: Handles the current alert and returns its message.

kw.name: Get Location
kw.doc: Returns the current browser window URL.

kw.name: Fetch From Right
kw.doc: Returns contents of the ``string`` after the last occurrence of ``marker``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: HEAD
kw.msg: HEAD Request : url=https://admin:admin@the-internet.herokuapp.com/basic_auth path_url=/basic_auth headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Authorization': 'Basic YWRtaW46YWRtaW4='} body=None
